resources.string: Allows modification of PDroid settings associated with applications.
Allows configuration of which apps are able to change PDroid settings
Please wait while the application list is generated
Please wait while your settings are saved

PAC, or PDroid Application Chooser allows users to nominate which applications are able to update PDroid settings.

Simply check those apps which you want to be able to modify PDroid settings, hit the save icon, and only those apps will be able to do so.
